definitions: the quality of being shy and reticent

examples.text: the tongue-tied introversion of the self-conscious artist
I struggle with introversion and shyness

shortDefinitions: quality of being shy and reticent

definitions: the tendency to be concerned with one's own thoughts and feelings rather than with external things

examples.text: we expected our sample to show elevated neuroticism and introversion

shortDefinitions: concern with one's own thoughts and feelings rather than with external things
